what_you_do: Kenji Kumara is recognized world-wide as a spiritual catalyst and is the creator of Quantum Lightweaving, Sedona Sacred Hikes and Joyful Creations Academy.
who_you_serve: Those who wish to explore their personal path of illumination and awaken to their Soul's destiny and life purpose.
social_proof: Kenji is recognized world-wide as a spiritual catalyst.
signature_programs: Quantum Lightweaving, Sedona Sacred Hikes, Joyful Creations Academy, Alchemical Transformation of the Chakras, Awakening Your Higher Consciousness 2.0, Cosmic Soul Immersion, Starseed Gateway Program
business_focus: Kenji serves as a facilitator of consciousness to assist those who wish to explore their personal path of illumination and awaken to their Soul's destiny and life purpose.
service_provided: spiritual retreats, mentorship programs, healing sessions, vortex hikes, online courses
